resources.string:
v1.0.1
Initial release of v1.0.1 built by Stranders at King\'s College London.

Web Team

- Kyle Hodgetts - Lead Web Developer
- Tahmidul Islam
- Phileas Hoquard
- Ana Jalba

Mobile Team

- Dominik Kulon - Lead Mobile Developer
- Charlie Baker
- Adam Chlupacek
- Benjamin Temple

Libraries

The hiTour Android app uses the following third party libraries, resources and tools:
- Zxing
- Zxing Android Embedded
- Retrofit
- OkHttp
- CircleImageView
- Gson
- Converter Gson
- ExoMedia
- JUnit
